speaker: Takima

intro.question: Andi na wan terrastory?
intro.explanation: Terrastories sa de fillong naso audio dus soso jee i ta jee an de sembe ta konda aba wan soni di pasa a wan kamia. Di 'applicatie' aki so bakaa kai eng de tak hii de gemeenschap o mang fu konda de egi histori over de belangrijk kamia fu a sa kon a di kaita

place_name: Fa u kali a kamia aki
